night. all!: chrome 20 is not listing pepper as a flash plugin, rather, it is using "libflashplayer.so". How can I set it to use pepper? with the current plugin I cannot play any kind of flash
you will need to create a symlink. Chances are within the chrome subdir there is a symlink to something that symlinks to libflashplayer.so. Interrupt it there.
